description: This is the entry point script for a React application, responsible for rendering the root component '<App />' inside the DOM element with id 'root'. It also imports necessary dependencies such as React, ReactDOM, CSS styles, and the main App component.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root for rendering React components in the specified DOM element.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot().render
methods.description: Renders React elements into the root created by ReactDOM.
